Select "Name(News)", "Name(Stock)", "Class(Item)", "URL(Now)", "Head(Now)", "Score", "Name(Country)","Img" From (Select "Name(News)", "Name(Stock)", "Class(Item)", "URL(Now)", "Head(Now)", "Score", "Name(Country)","Img" from "Word(Analysis)" WHERE (Trunc(TO_DATE("Date(Now)", 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))) = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and ("Name(Stock)" = #{Name_Stock} or "Class(Item)" = #{Class_Item} or "Name(Country)" = #{Name_Country}) order by ABS("Score") desc) A where ROWNUM = 1
